amendment.description: To Increase Funding for the Environmental Protection Agency for the Clean Water and Safe Drinking Water State Revolving Funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2784 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2784 proposed by Senator Crapo. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2659-2663; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2660) To Increase Funding for the Environmental Protection Agency for the Clean Water and Safe Drinking Water State Revolving Funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2784 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
